original_text: So Rahab put a rope out through the window of her house. (The house that she lived in was part of the city wall.) The men climbed down the rope.
korean_text: 라합이 그들을 창문에서 줄로 달아 내리니 그의 집이 성벽 위에 있으므로 그가 성벽 위에 거주하였음이라

sentences.original_text: So Rahab put a rope out
through the window of her house
The house that she lived in
was part of the city wall
The men climbed down the rope
